attributes.action: Ensure that the BBC release a version of the iplayer for both MAC and LINUX users as agreed on its original launch.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The following statements have been pasted from the BBC website dated 7th September 2007
"The BBC has said that a Mac version of the iPlayer will be released in the autumn followed by versions for Windows Vista and mobile gadgets"
"The BBC Trust has committed to making sure the BBC would meet calls for non-Windows versions of the iPlayer "as soon as possible" said the government statement"
However on 15th October the following was posted
"Mr Highfield said the BBC had not committed to offering the iPlayer to Mac and Linux users who want to download and keep content on their machines for a limited period"
Clearly there is no accountability within the BBC.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
